name: FEEF
description:
CONTROLS

SHENFOLD UNITED = LEFT AND RIGHT

CHANBESTEN VILLAGE = A & D

SHAKE THE TABLE BECAUSE THE BALL GOT STUCK = SPACE

I was going to buy Fifa for my brother this Christmas, but he decided last minute to buy it off the internet instead because it was too expensive in store. So, I needed something for him to open on Christmas day.

Filled to the brim with Christmas eve food and one too many drinks, I set about building that something at 1am.

ENJOY
